qa_list.question: What is the purpose of the HUB at Carnegie Mellon Home?
qa_list.answer: The HUB is a central location for various resources and tools related to course schedules, book information, feedback, and more.
qa_list.ref_chunk:
Carnegie Mellon Home

The HUB

Map/Legend

Text Book Information

Welcome

Course Search

Complete Schedule

Feedback

Complete Schedule Of Classes

These files are updated NIGHTLY. Changes made today will not be reflected until the next morning.

We recommend using print preview to ensure that all schedule data fits on the printed page. If necessary, use print properties to reduce the scaling percentage. In the print dialog box, select properties, advanced and under graphics lower the percentage.

qa_list.question: What format(s) can you use to view the class schedules at Carnegie Mellon Home?
qa_list.answer: You can view the class schedules in PDF and HTML formats. The specific file types are Spring Class Schedule PDF, HTML Summer One/All Class Schedule PDF, HTML Summer Two Class Schedule PDF, HTML Fall Class Schedule PDF, HTML.
